column5: We are one year away from the 2011 Muskies Canada Muskie Odyssey VI in St. Catharines!  Canada's BEST, and ONLY all Muskie Show!  We have a couple of speakers lined up that are the biggest names in the Muskie Fishing world!    ALL proceeds raised by Muskies Canada goes directly back into the fishery, supporting projects like the LSMRP-Lake Simcoe Muskelunge Restoration Project, Catch & Release Study(2009/2010) by Dr. Steven Cooke and Sean Landsman, KTD(Know The Difference)Signs(check out how many are around the Kawartha Lakes now!)   http://www.muskiescanada.ca/general_information/odyssey.php
Just this morning I was talking about next years Odyssee Dax and am all ready looking forward to it.  Always guaranteed to be a great day.

too bad it doesn't happen every year. oh well, we're over half way there! always a good time, see lots of OFC'ers and even though I didn't get what I was looking for on the silent auction, the raffle prize tables were good to me!
thats a loong wait. see you there. i love the concept. monies raised go back to the fishery.    good stuff guys.
Always a great time at the Oddy. But you know, bowling is where it's at! ha ha ha
I had a great time last year and looking forward to it next year. It's on the calender!
I'll be there for sure in eleven.
